title: Breaking the Arm, Healing the Heart
description: A Young Adult Contemporary This book contains some mature content.Sun Coast High and Marina H.S. are rival schools. Sicily is Sun Coast's head cheerleader, an egotistical girl who people either love or hate. Lucas is her male counterpoint at Marina. He is the handsome and charismatic basketball star, the "king" of his school. They are not only school rivals, but archenemies, due to their egos and stubbornness. One day, Sicily accidentally breaks Lucas' arm, resulting in her being consigned to help him.Find out what happens when two dynamic teens are forced into such a close relationship.*Note from This newly revised edition contains corrections of previous grammatical errors. I sincerely appreciate any feedback from readers, as it is my goal to produce the best book possible. Thank your for your interest, and hope you enjoy the new, improved version of Breaking the Arm, Healing the Heart.~~~~~Scroll up and click 'Buy Now' to start reading today!
author: Ashley  Andrews
